name: Hot Potato (itch) (POLIMI Game Collective)
description: Hot Potato is a single player 2D platformer with a twist! The chef makes the mistake of quickly using his bare hands to transfer a freshly baked potato to a plate, but realizes he has to travel further than expected. The goal is to reach the plate of his customers without burning his hands with the hot potato, which means juggling it in the air. Overcome obstacles in different kinds of worlds and defeat enemies using the smoking hot potato on the way!
